title: Google's ChatGPT rival Bard launches in Europe and Brazil
description: Google’s Bard artificial intelligence chatbot can now also talk and respond to visual prompts.

title: GST: India's online game tax could kill a booming industry
description: The industry says it has been blindsided by the government's "catastrophic" tax decision.

title: Microsoft: China accused of hacking US government emails
description: The US Secretary of Commerce was among those impacted by the breach, according to reports.
